mapper.sql: HYID as hyid,BHID as bhid,HYRQ as hyrq,HYSJ as hysj,SDID as sdid,SFYY as sfyy,SFDJ as sfdj,DJYS as djys
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OP_SBHY ( HYID , BHID , HYRQ , HYSJ , SDID , SFYY , SFDJ , DJYS ) VALUES ( #{hyid} , #{bhid} , #{hyrq} , #{hysj} , #{sdid} , #{sfyy} , #{sfdj} , #{djys} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.HYID AS hyid, A.HYRQ AS hyrq, A.HYSJ AS hysj, B.BHID AS bhid, B.SBBH AS sbbh, B.SBMC AS sbmc, B.SBDZ AS sbdz FROM OP_SBHY A LEFT JOIN OP_SBBH B ON B.BHID = A.BHID WHERE A.SFYY = 0 AND SFDJ = 0 AND B.JKLX = #{JKLX} AND concat( A.HYRQ, ' ' , A.HYSJ) >= #{HYRQ} ORDER by A.HYRQ, A.HYSJ
mapper.update: UPDATE OP_SBHY SET SFYY = 1 WHERE HYID = #{hyid}
UPDATE OP_SBHY SET SFDJ = 0, DJYS = '', SFYY = 0 WHERE HYID = #{hyid}
update OP_SBHY set SFYY = 0, SFDJ = 0,DJYS = NULL where HYID = (select jc.HYID from CIS_HZYZ_ZT zt ,CIS_JCSQ01 jc where zt.SQID = jc.JCXH and zt.JLXH = #{jlxh})
update OP_SBHY set SFDJ=0,DJYS='' where HYID = #{hyid}
mapper.select:
SELECT CONCAT( 't_', a.SDID, '_',( SELECT jklx FROM OP_SBBH WHERE a.BHID = bhid ),'_',a.BHID) AS id, count( a.HYID ) AS value FROM OP_SBHY a, CIS_JCSQ01 b LEFT JOIN MPI_BRDA brda ON b.brid = brda.brid WHERE a.HYRQ >= #{data} AND #{data1} >= a.HYRQ AND a.HYID = b.HYID
AND brda.brxm LIKE #{brxm}
and b.JCZT>2
GROUP BY a.SDID, a.BHID
SELECT CONCAT('t_kyyrc_' ,( SELECT jklx FROM OP_SBBH WHERE h.BHID = bhid ), '_' , h.BHID) AS id, count( h.HYID ) AS value FROM OP_SBHY h WHERE h.HYRQ >= #{data} AND #{data1} >= h.HYRQ GROUP BY h.BHID

SELECT CONCAT('t_yyyrc_' ,( SELECT jklx FROM OP_SBBH WHERE a.BHID = bhid ), '_' , a.BHID) AS id, count( a.HYID ) AS value FROM OP_SBHY a WHERE a.HYRQ >= #{data} AND #{data1} >= a.HYRQ AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CIS_JCSQ01 b WHERE a.HYID = b.HYID ) GROUP BY a.BHID
mapper.update: update OP_SBHY set SFYY = 0, SFDJ = 0,DJYS = NULL where HYID = (select distinct jc.HYID from CIS_HZYZ_ZT zt ,CIS_JCSQ01 jc where zt.SQID = jc.JCXH and zt.SQID = #{sqid} and zt.YZLX = #{yzlx})
